function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of contagious diseases within the community radio station and podcast production environment.","Impact":"Risk of infecting staff, volunteers, and guests with the contagious disease, leading to health complications and potential spread to the wider community.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, regular testing, and vaccination of staff, volunteers, and guests. Maintaining physical distancing and using personal protective equipment.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C disinfection systems, and contactless temperature screening devices.","People":"Staff, volunteers, guests, and the wider community.","Owner":"Management of the community radio station and podcast production team."},{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases through close contact during podcast interviews and broadcasting activities.","Impact":"Risk of infecting podcast guests and hosts, potentially leading to widespread transmission of the disease among the targeted audience and the wider community.","Mitigation":"Conducting interviews in well-ventilated spaces, encouraging vaccination, and implementing virtual interviewing options. Educating staff and guests about proper hygiene practices.","Technologies":"Video conferencing platforms for virtual interviews, wearable health monitoring devices for staff and guests.","People":"Podcast hosts, guests, and the wider community targeted by the podcast.","Owner":"Podcast production team and management."},{"Description":"Risks associated with international travel and interaction with global urban academics and professionals.","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to contagious diseases from international travel and interaction with individuals from diverse geographic regions. Potential spread of diseases across borders.","Mitigation":"Following travel advisories and guidelines, getting vaccinated before travel, and adhering to quarantine requirements. Maintaining virtual communication where possible.","Technologies":"Health monitoring apps, digital contact tracing systems, and telemedicine services for remote health consultations.","People":"Podcast hosts, guests, and professionals in the global urban academic community.","Owner":"Podcast production team and relevant authorities."}]}
